name: msdn_help.vim
description:
This plugin provide display help text on dexplorer(MSDN help).
'dexplorer.exe' process must be started in advance.

Requirements:
- Vim7.1 or later.
- Python
http://www.python.org/download/
- Python Win32 Extension
http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=78018

Key mapping:
In normal mode
<space>h  Search the word under the cursor.
In visual mode
<space>h Search the text selected in visual mode.
install_details: Download msdn_help-0_0_1.zip, and extract your ~/vimfiles directory.
